patterns: Hello

responses: Hello! Welcome to Garam Chai. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! Ready to order some delightful treats from Garam Chai?

patterns: What types of tea do you offer?
Tell me about your tea options.
What flavors of tea do you have?
responses: We offer a variety of teas, including Rose, Ilaichi, Adrak, Paan, and Regular. All teas are priced at Rs 20. Which one would you like to try?

patterns: Do you serve coffee?
Tell me about your coffee options.
Hot or cold coffee?
responses: Certainly! We have both hot and cold coffee available, priced at Rs 20. What's your preference?

patterns: What kind of pizzas do you have?
Tell me about your pizza options.
Do you have vegetarian pizzas?
responses: We have a delicious veg pizza with toppings like onion, capsicum, and corn, priced at Rs 50. Would you like to order one?

patterns: Yes
Sure
I'd like to order the veg pizza.
responses: Great choice! Please confirm your order, and don't forget to include your delivery address.

patterns: What types of sandwiches do you offer?
Tell me about your sandwich options.
Grilled or regular sandwich?
responses: We have Grilled Mix Veg sandwiches and Regular sandwiches on our menu, priced at Rs 30. Which one are you in the mood for?

patterns: Yes
Sure
I'd like to order the Grilled Mix Veg sandwich.
responses: Fantastic choice! Please confirm your order, and don't forget to include your delivery address.

patterns: I'd like to order tea.
Can I get some tea, please?
I want to try your tea options.
responses: Great choice! Please provide your address, and we'll deliver your selected tea to you. Each tea is priced at Rs 20.

patterns: Yes
Sure
I'd like to order the Rose tea.
responses: Excellent! Please confirm your order, and don't forget to include your delivery address.

patterns: How does the delivery work?
What's your delivery process?
Can you deliver to my location?
responses: We offer delivery services. Please provide your address, and we'll ensure your order reaches you.

patterns: Can I customize my order?
Do you accommodate special requests?
I have dietary restrictions. Can you help?
responses: Absolutely! We can customize your order based on your preferences or dietary restrictions. Please let us know your requirements.

patterns: I'd like to confirm my order.
Order confirmed.
Here is my delivery address.
responses: Thank you for confirming your order! Please provide your delivery address so we can ensure a smooth delivery process.

patterns: Can I sit and dine here?
Is there seating available?
Can I eat inside your shop?
responses: Yes, absolutely! We would love to have you in the shop. Feel free to find a comfortable seat and enjoy your time with us.

patterns: Do you have options for eating here?
Can I dine in?
Is there a place to eat at your shop?
responses: Certainly! Along with our delightful teas, you can enjoy our delicious pizzas and sandwiches right here at our cozy shop.

patterns: Thank you
Thanks for your help
Appreciate it
responses: You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to ask. Enjoy your order from Garam Chai!

patterns: What are your opening hours?
When do you open?
Tell me your business hours.
responses: We are open from 8 AM to 8 PM every day.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with a credit card?
Do you accept cash?
responses: We accept cash, credit cards, and online payments through our secure portal.

patterns: How long does delivery take?
What's the average delivery time?
When can I expect my order?
responses: Delivery times vary based on location. On average, it takes 30-45 minutes.

patterns: Do you have any discounts or promotions?
Are there any special offers?
Tell me about your loyalty program.
responses: Yes, we have ongoing discounts and promotions. Check our website for the latest offers.

patterns: Can I check the status of my order?
How do I track my delivery?
Where is my food?
responses: You can track your order through our website or contact our customer support for assistance.

patterns: What's your most popular item?
Can you recommend something from the menu?
What do customers love the most?
responses: Our most popular item is the Rose Tea and Grilled Mix Veg Sandwich. Customers rave about them!

patterns: Do you accommodate allergies?
Are your products suitable for vegetarians?
I have a gluten intolerance. Can I still order?
responses: Yes, we can accommodate allergies and dietary restrictions. Please inform us when placing your order.

patterns: How can I provide feedback?
Can I leave a review?
I want to share my experience.
responses: We appreciate your feedback! You can leave a review on our website or contact us directly.

patterns: Tell me about your loyalty program.
How can I join your rewards program?
Are there benefits for frequent customers?
responses: Our loyalty program offers exclusive discounts and rewards for our valued customers. Joining is easy!

patterns: Is everything on the menu available?
Do you have any items out of stock?
What's currently unavailable?
responses: We strive to keep all items available, but occasionally, some items may be temporarily out of stock. We apologize for any inconvenience.

patterns: Are you open on holidays?
What's your schedule during holidays?
Can I order on public holidays?
responses: Our holiday schedule may vary. Please check our website or contact us for specific information on holiday hours.

patterns: Do you have vegan options?
Are any of your products vegan?
Tell me about your vegan-friendly items.
responses: Yes, we have vegan options available, including vegan sandwiches and teas.

patterns: Can I place a bulk order?
Do you offer catering services?
I need to order for a large group.
responses: Certainly! We offer catering services, and you can place bulk orders. Contact us in advance for special arrangements.

patterns: Can I pick up my order?
Do you offer a pickup option?
Is there a takeaway service?
responses: Yes, we offer a pickup option. You can place your order online and pick it up at our location.

patterns: Is there Wi-Fi available in your shop?
Can I access Wi-Fi while at your establishment?
Do you provide free internet?
responses: Yes, we provide complimentary Wi-Fi for our customers. Feel free to ask our staff for the access details.

patterns: I think I left something at your shop. Can you help?
Is there a lost and found service?
I lost an item during my visit.
responses: We have a lost and found service. Please describe the lost item, and we'll do our best to assist you.

patterns: Do you host events or special occasions?
Can I book your venue for a private event?
Tell me about your event hosting services.
responses: Yes, we host events and special occasions. Contact us for details on booking our venue for your private event.

patterns: How do I become a loyal customer?
Tell me about rewards for frequent customers.
Are there benefits for regular patrons?
responses: Becoming a loyal customer is easy! Join our rewards program, and enjoy exclusive benefits with each visit.

patterns: I'm having trouble with your website. Can you help?
Is there customer support for your online platform?
Tell me about website assistance.
responses: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please contact our customer support for assistance with any website-related issues.

patterns: Do you have kid-friendly options?
Are there items suitable for children on the menu?
Tell me about your offerings for kids.
responses: Yes, we have kid-friendly options on our menu, including special treats that children love.
